ee anuwa hemamala kumariyage kes kalambaa matha sangawa ganimin dantha kumarunge aarakshawa mada apa pinwath ratata dalada wahanse wadama karawana ladde kithsiri mewan raja samayeya.11 wani siyawase polonnaru rajadhaniye aga rajana wu lilawathi rajya samayedi pujya dhammakiththi himiyan wisin rachitha data wanshaya nam lada shreshta kruthiya ha indiya bauddha jana sahithya parilashilanaya karamin sanath abesekara thira rachanayen hada kala ohu wisinma adhyakshanaya karana lada ‘siri daladagamanaya’ dawantha sinama kruthiyehi anthargatha wanne apa pinbara mathru bhumiyata dalada wahanse wadama wu apuru kathandarayayi.kanda udarata dalada maligawe wada hindimin hama satha wetha setha sadana dalada wahanse pilibanda aprakata thorathuru athulath mema sinama kruthiya marthu 06 wanida sita ee. ee. pi. mandalaye sinamahalwala thiragatha weyi.siri daladagamanaya nalu nili kala:jiwan kumaranathunga, githa kumarasinha, mak samsan, kamal deshapriya, udara rathnayaka, piyumi botheju, sureni ayangika, nilukshi perera, shriyantha mendis, dilhani eekanayaka, wasantha dukgannarala, wishwa lanka, chinthaka kulathunga, shrinath maddumage, sudarman radaliyagoda, asanga perera, jayantha athapaththu, denuwan senadhira, gnyananga gunawardhana, ostin samarawikrama, ji. aar. perera, sanjaya amarasinha, thissa bandaranayaka, somawira gamage, gayan wikramathilaka, madhumadawa arawinda, nimal jayasinha, chandrasoma binduhewa, saranapala jayasuriya, nanda wikramage, shanika bandarapujya shasthrapathi akarawita sanghananda himipanoaacharya soma edirisinhahandunwa dena:prasadi samarakon, heshan manulagaru rangapam:anusha damayanthi, chandana wikramasinha, lushan bulathsinhala, hayisinth wijerathnalama charitha:nirman abesekara, thisal sanjayanishpadana kalamanakaranaya:harald karanathilaka, thissa liyanaaarachchi, palitha herathsajiwi thrimanakaranaya:nilan kure, hemajith, gayan gunasekara, firos faruk, rawin weththasinhaginumkaranaya:en. ke. jayawardhana, hiranya akwaththa, anura kulasekara, asanka katuwawala, lenadpasuthala salasum saha idikirim:welegedara ranasinhapasuthala nirmana alankaranaya:sunil wijerathnakala adhyakshanaya:suneth nandalalanga rachanaya:priyantha eeshwarakebal satan adhyakshanaya:tedi widyalankarasatan adhyakshanaya:sandun pranandu,sumudu prananduandum saha aabharana nirmanaya:kumara karawdeniyanatum adhyakshanaya:chandana wikramasinhagitha rachanaya:pujya ellawala medhananda himi, pujya pallegama hemarathana himi, pujya deniyaye panynyaloka buddharakkhitha himigitha gayana:nanda malini, sunil edirisinha, uresha rawihari, ishak beg, shanika madhumali, gayani madhusha, madhani jayasenaathireka kamara adhyakshanaya saha aalokakaranaya:chandana jayasinhakamara adhyakshanaya saha aalokakaranaya:ke. di. dayanandashabda paripalanaya:aruna priyantha kaluaarachchisanskaranaya:ajith ramanayakasanskarana adhikshanaya:rawindra gurugesahaya adhyakshanaya:prasanna iththapanasangitha adhyakshanaya:ranga dasanayakawidhayaka nishpadanaya:nihal sanjayapradhana kamara adhyakshanaya saha aalokakaranaya:suminda wirasinhanishpadana kruthyadhikari:dipa edirisinhanishpadanaya:pujya shasthrapathi akarawita sanghananda himipano, aacharya soma edirisinhakathawa, debas, thira rachanaya sasaha adhyakshanaya - sanath abesekara
